member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Internal.Encoders.LengthPrefixedTextMessageParser.TryParseMessage(System.ReadOnlyBuffer{System.Byte}@,System.ReadOnlyBuffer{System.Byte}@)
member.summary: Attempts to parse a message from the buffer. Returns 'false' if there is not enough data to complete a message. Throws an exception if there is a format error in the provided data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Internal.Protocol.JsonHubProtocol.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the using the specified to serialize application payloads (arguments, results, etc.). The serialization of the outer protocol can NOT be changed using this serializer.
member.param: The to use to serialize application payloads (arguments, results, etc.).
